text: Tara niscaya'i ksati kareche yara allah‌ra sathe mulakata ha'oya asbikara kare, ye paryanta na tadera kache atarkite ese pare ghari-ghanta, takhana tara balabe -- ''haya! E sanbandhe amara abahela karechilama ba’le aphasosa!’’ Ara tara tadera bojha tadera pithe bahana karabe. Eti ki ati nikrsta naya ya tara bahana karache
